item.title: PulseAudio — Combining Two or More Output Devices
item.description: About how I combined the speakers in my two monitors into a single virtual audio device that can be used to play back audio. Debugging PulseAudio Before doing anything it can be useful to run PulseAudio in a terminal in order to get its output and/or possible error messages. First stop any existing PulseAudio daemon, example for systemd, and start locally. # Remove '--user' if running system wide. $ systemctl --user stop pulseaudio $ pulseaudio -v Configure PulseAudio Open the file /etc/pulse/default.
